name: Get_Hotel_Facilities

docs_row.name: Get_Hotel_Facilities
docs_row.func_description: Retrieves a list of facilities and services (e.g., pool, gym, Wi-Fi) offered by a specified hotel, with optional filtering by date and language.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

arrival_date.description: The date on which you will arrive or check-in

departure_date.description: The date of departure or check-out.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

response_summary:
The accommodation offers a range of facilities and highlights to enhance your stay. Among the available amenities, you'll find air conditioning provided free of charge, ensuring a comfortable environment. The property also features designated smoking areas, though the pricing details for this service are not specified. For those who prefer a smoke-free atmosphere, the entire premises is non-smoking. 

Key highlights of the accommodation include internet services for staying connected, non-smoking rooms for a fresh and clean experience, and room service for added convenience. The facilities are organized into general categories, with some features available in select rooms. The layout of the property is also outlined, though no additional details are provided. Overall, the accommodation prioritizes comfort and convenience for guests.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers evaluating hotel amenities before booking. It retrieves detailed facility information for a specific hotel, including air conditioning, smoking policies, internet services, and room features. Users can filter results by check-in/check-out dates and language preferences. The response highlights key amenities and services, helping guests assess comfort and convenience for their stay. The hotel ID must be obtained from SearchHotels or SearchHotelsByCoordinates APIs.

enhanced_parameters.hotel_id: Unique identifier for the hotel, sourced from search endpoints.
enhanced_parameters.arrival_date: Filters facilities available from this check-in date.
enhanced_parameters.departure_date: Filters facilities available until this check-out date.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data.

accommodationHighlights.description: An array of highlights for the accommodation, currently empty in the provided response.

facilities.description: An array of facility objects detailing the amenities available at the accommodation.

ar_items.description: A facility object representing a specific amenity.

groupId.description: Identifier for the group to which the facility belongs.

instances.description: An array of instances of the facility.

ar_items.description: An instance of a facility, detailing its specific attributes.

title.description: The name or title of the facility instance.

subFacilities.description: An array of sub-facilities related to this instance, currently empty in the provided response.

attributes.description: Attributes of the facility instance, including payment and schedule information.

name.description: The name of the facility attribute, if any.

paymentInfo.description: Information regarding the payment mode for the facility.

chargeMode.description: The mode of charge for the facility (e.g., 'FREE', 'UNKNOWN_CHARGE_MODE').

closureScheduleDuringStay.description: An array detailing any closure schedules during the stay, currently empty in the provided response.

scheduleEntry.description: An array of schedule entries for the facility, currently empty in the provided response.

extendedAttributes.description: Any extended attributes for the facility, if available.

highlights.description: An array of highlight objects showcasing key features of the accommodation.

ar_items.description: A highlight object representing a key feature.

instances.description: An array of instances of the highlight.

ar_items.description: An instance of a highlight, detailing its specific attributes.

title.description: The name or title of the highlight instance.

facilityGroups.description: An array of facility group objects categorizing the amenities.

ar_items.description: A facility group object representing a category of amenities.

id.description: Unique identifier for the facility group.

title.description: The title or name of the facility group.

summary.description: A summary description of the facility group, if available.
